title: yArammA nI
sahitya:
yArammA nI kaDaikkaN pArammA vErE gati
yArammA endan tuyar thIrammA enpOl pAril pEdai


anupallavi

  tIrammA samsAra nOi ghOram Ezhai ensheivEn
kArammaa anbark-kinba mAri pozhiyum deivam


caraNam    ettanaiyO tunba shUrAvaLi tAkka  iNaiyaDi dhyAna
 bhajanam vandu kai tUkka ettanaiyO inba shUzhalil amaidhi 
 tEkka hrdayAlayattuL vandhezhundharuLoDu kAkka vEru
